title: Mathematics-Based Interdisciplinary Integrated Education for Sustainable Urban Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics and Fundamental Urban Planning Concepts
context.additional_context: Sustainable urban development project management competency enhancement program operated via smartphone-based LMS. Most learners are office/administrative professionals with advanced mathematics and environmental knowledge.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically design and evaluate resource optimization models in urban infrastructure projects.
Learners can apply data-driven decision-making frameworks for environmental impact assessments.
Learners contribute to the development of sustainability indicators through mathematical modeling in multidisciplinary team collaborations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
